title: Mini Myth: Don't Mess with the God of Wine, Duh
itunes:title: Mini Myth: Don't Mess with the God of Wine, Duh
itunes:subtitle: Euripides' play The Bacchae, basically the first rager.
description:
A telling of Euripides' play The Bacchae which is basically the first rager. There's a lot of partying, wine, and violence. Don't mess with a god devoted to the world's best beverage.


CW/TW: far too many Greek myths involve assault. Given it's fiction, and typically involves gods and/or monsters, I'm not as deferential as I would be were I referencing the real thing.


Attributions and licensing information for music used in the podcast can be found here: mythsbaby.com/sources-attributions.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
